statements: SELECT * FROM media_outlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM media_outlets ORDER BY outlet_name DESC;
SELECT journalist_name, journalist_email FROM journalists WHERE outlet_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM public_relations_teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT journalist_name, journalist_email FROM journalists WHERE journalist_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY journalist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_type='Newspaper';
SELECT journalist_name, journalist_email, outlet_name FROM journalists INNER JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id;
SELECT outlet_name, COUNT(journalist_id) AS total_journalists FROM journalists INNER JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id GROUP BY outlet_name;
SELECT journalist_name, journalist_email, outlet_name FROM journalists INNER JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id ORDER BY journalist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_relations_teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%PR%';
SELECT * FROM media_outlets;
SELECT outlet_name, outlet_type FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_id = 1;
SELECT journalist_name FROM journalists WHERE outlet_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM journalists WHERE journalist_id = 3;
SELECT journalist_id, journalist_name, outlet_name FROM journalists INNER JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id;
SELECT * FROM journalists WHERE journalist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY journalist_name DESC;
SELECT journalist_name, outlet_name FROM journalists JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id WHERE journalists.journalist_id < 5;
SELECT outlet_name, COUNT(*) AS total_journalists FROM journalists JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id GROUP BY outlet_name HAVING total_journalists > 2;
SELECT journalist_name, outlet_name FROM journalists JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id WHERE journalists.journalist_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT journalist_id, journalist_name, outlet_name, outlet_type FROM journalists JOIN media_outlets ON journalists.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id ORDER BY outlet_name ASC, journalist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_media;
SELECT media_name, media_type FROM news_media ORDER BY media_name DESC;
SELECT journalist_name, media_name FROM journalists JOIN news_media ON journalists.media_id = news_media.media_id;
SELECT team_name FROM pr_teams WHERE team_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM pr_teams WHERE media_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM news_media;
SELECT media_name, media_type FROM news_media ORDER BY media_name ASC;
SELECT journalist_name, media_name FROM journalists JOIN news_media ON journalists.media_id = news_media.media_id WHERE journalists.journalist_id > 5;
SELECT journalists.journalist_name, pr_teams.team_name FROM journalists JOIN pr_teams ON journalists.media_id = pr_teams.media_id ORDER BY journalists.journalist_name DESC, pr_teams.team_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_media_count FROM news_media;

SELECT media_outlet_name, media_outlet_type FROM media_outlets ORDER BY media_outlet_name DESC;

SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Partnership' ORDER BY relationship_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Partnership' ORDER BY media_outlet_id, journalist_id;
